Author: oh_not_again_01
Text: I stopped binging by going to a nutritionist (so I have a meal plan), rigidly eating at the same hour every day (e.g: lunch at 1 pm, snack at 5 pm, dinner at 7, etc). Also, exercise is honestly an extremely useful support. When I work out I don't feel like binging 90% of days. Try doing it every day, even if it's for a few minutes. Stay away from binge foods if it's possible. I know it's hard, but oh well, we're in this together, not alone.
